Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I am/have been writing a blog for a writing class I am in, so I decided to write it entirely from the main characters POV. So that I am not wasting your time here in the link to it.

http://lifeoftheavergekerbal.blogspot.com/

I ask you to be patient, since it will be a bit between updates. This is my first time doing something like this, so please let me know what you think.

Stay safe and have fun everybody!

team.leit

Edited December 2, 2013 by team.leit
